QuestData.Title: Invasive Species
QuestData.Description: We should seek out an alternate source of energy just in case I am wrong about the conduits.$b$bLuckily enough, I think I know where we can find one.$b$bThe panthara native to Argus are solitary creatures, but it seems whatever magic the Wakeners possessed has drawn them here in great numbers.$b$bThis is no time to be gentle with the environment--panthara devour energy to survive.$b$bSlay them and see if you cannot reclaim some of the power they have consumed.
QuestData.CompletionText: There is always room for a backup plan. Did you find what we seek?
QuestData.RewardText: I had not imagined the final product to be so... sticky.$b$b<Y'mera wipes her hands on her robes.>$b$bIt will do.
